response.overview: Repalle is a beautiful love story made in the backdrop of village, mixed with subtle comedy and a bit of social message. Ram(Lead Actor) & Sita (Lead Actress) are beautiful couple, who loves each other. Sita plans to introduce ram to his father and ask for permission to marry him. Ram doesn’t turnup and sita doesn’t know why. Due to some incidents in his life, ram goes to his village and starts organic farming and helps a great deal for his village people in introducing innovative methods of farming. Sita who has no clue about ram keeps waiting for him, despite her father forcing her to marry another person. Sita knows about ram through some charity activities planned by her company CEO. She gets permission for working on those activities and finally meets ram. Then she convinces him to marry her.
response.title: Repalle
